name: node_app
description: basic node app w/ typescript and docker

scripts.dev: tsc && concurrently --raw "tsc --watch" "npm run watch -s" "nodemon -q --config nodemon.json index.js"
scripts.dev-tasksSS: concurrently --raw "pm2 stop all --silent && npm start" "npm run -s lint"
scripts.devSS: npm run start && npm run lint && chokidar "**/*.ts" -c "npm run -s dev-tasks"
scripts.dev-tasksSSSSSS: concurrently --raw "forever --silent stopall && npm start" "npm run -s lint"
scripts.devSSSSS: npm run start && chokidar "**/*.ts" -c "npm run -s dev-tasks"
